spec_data.Name: pagure-milters
spec_data.Description:
Milters (Mail filters) allowing the integration of pagure and emails.
This is useful for example to allow commenting on a ticket by email.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 10 Aug 2017 04:18:49 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Milter to integrate pagure with emails
